name: The Dreamscape
description: The Dreamscape is a mobile game insipired by Magic Touch. The player play as the Light Etheral being in the dream world. Their objective is to get to the temple before the Dark Etheral in order to keep the balance of the dream world in check. Along the endless path, the players will meet obstacles on their journey. They will need to use Swipe gestures to destroy them before they damage the player.
